channel.title: Two Questions~
channel.description:
1.How do I add currecny's do different shop's.E.G. If I wanted to add like the tazzahar currency to the guy's who sell the tazzahar runes for like 5 tazhhar coins.But just for like 5 shop's.
2.How do I make npc's drop like 100 coins or 100 tazzahar coins I know how to make npc drop's but not to make the npc drop 995 100000.
